about_the_game:
Jurnal Malam : Bestfirend
is a story about the unshakable friendship between two friends, Afdal and Rahmad. However, that night, when Rahmad asked Afdal for help to guard his house, a terrible terror changed everything.

When playing the role of Afdal, you will be faced with a different fate from Rahmad. The tension rises when Afdal must face an unexpected fear, opening the door to a tense adventure.

Warning
This game has the potential to trigger seizures in people with photosensitive epilepsy. Please play wisely.

Important Note
Experience deep and varied exploration, accompanied by slowly building tension. The powerful story is supported by electrifying sound, building an unpredictable atmosphere. Prepare yourself for psychological challenges that test your resilience.

Environment
From the mysterious Rahmad House, the haunted Abandoned Building, to the eerie Forest, you will feel the tension gripping every corner.



Supernatural Creatures
Meet the mysterious Kuntilanak, get ready to face an unexpected presence.



Object Interaction
Explore and interact various objects in the game, express your thoughts, and discover their function in a thrilling adventure.



Hide and Seek
When fear lurks, you must be clever at hiding from the mysterious entity that haunts you.



Fight
Prepare for a tense battle, where your every move could decide your fate.



Two Endings
Your choices will shape the ending of the story, choose wisely to uncover the hidden mystery.

Investigation
Explore the truth about Afdal and Rahmad, uncover the mystery behind Rahmad's House, and gain deeper understanding every time you explore.



Developer Comment
Although demons in the game cannot cause physical harm, their impact can be felt in the player's mind and psychology. It is recommended to play this game with caution, especially for those who are afraid of the dark, have heart problems, or feel uncomfortable playing alone.



RiMa Studio
Built with enthusiasm by a worker from Aceh, Indonesia, this project is the result of independent learning. Even though it is difficult, we continue to strive to provide a stunning and engaging gaming experience for players.
